text: Amazing job. Amazing service. Reasonably price. Dean could not have been nicer. He went out of his way to create 3 beautiful floral arraignments. I did not give him much time but he was gracious enough to pull through for my special occasion. Thank you Ace Florist! Everyone wanted to take an arrangement home! They were perfect.

My family is on Long Island and I live on the west coast, every occasion and holiday I send an Ace Florist "designer's choice" arrangement or center piece in lieu of us being at the table to celebrate. Without fail, every birthday, Thanksgiving or Christmas 1-2 people who saw the arrangement will text me to ask where I ordered the flowers from. I have yet to see these arrangements in person or meet the proprietors but I am extremely grateful and appreciative for the work they do and the joy they bring to the people I love.  Huge kudos to this team! Their website is super easy to use, I like the occasion reminders and text delivery updates. This picture was sent to me from a guest from Thanksgiving 2021.

The images don’t do any justice. The flower arrangement gorgeous. I didn’t know what I wanted I just described what I needed and he came up with this beautiful piece! Support your local florist!!! It was a last min pick up order too!

Surprised about the positive reviews. Ordered an arrangement, and was embarrassed when I arrived to the event and saw it personally. At least 30% less flowers than what I ordered. They will definitely short you if you give out of state billing address.

Amazing service, totally fair pricing. I know nothing about flowers and wanted to get my partner some, they were super helpful and made such a nice bouquet for me at a really reasonable price. Will definitely come back!

Called & ordered flowers for my wife's birthday. She works right down the block and they assured me they'd be delivered in a timely fashion. Sure enough, within an hour she got a beautiful arrangement delivered to her job! Price was fair and service was A+. Highly recommend giving them your business and I'll be a returning customer for sure!
(Оригинал)

Calling from out of state (PA) it's sometimes difficult having a business understand what you'd like. Not with Ace, Pat was easy to talk with, professional, patient, friendly & pleasant. Pleasure to have chosen Ace to process my order. Family owned business. Would contact Pat from Ace again for all my LI orders.

I purchased a mixed bouquet today and was blown away by the quality of the flowers, arrangement and service I was given. I was greeted by Dean who listened intently and who exceeded my expectations. I would highly recommend this florist to anyone in the area who is looking for great quality, service  and effortless buying experience. Thank you Dean!!!!

Ace Florist donated the most beautiful arrangements for the Health and Welfare Council of Long Island's 2nd Annual Halloween Ball!  I couldn't believe their generosity and kindness.  They provided 10 harvest arrangements that we gave to the winners of our costume contest.  We can't thank them enough and will always use them for all of our floral needs!

My husband and I live in Texas, but learned of a funeral in Syosset and needed to have flowers sent, same day.  Not only was Dean accommodating, he was incredibly insightful and helped me make the best selection.  Any time I have to send flowers on Long Island, I will certainly be calling Ace first to see if delivery would be within their area.  Thank you, Dean!
Walked in. Gentleman told me he had just made some arrangements and placed them outside. Beautiful, quick and easy. Thank you!

I’m not a person who writes reviews, but I feel compelled to write this one. On short notice last Saturday, l sent my Aunt flowers in Oyster Bay from Ace Florist. Not only did they take time to make suggestions, the flowers were delivered in a timely fashion. More importantly my Aunt was ecstatic. I will be using Ace Florist as my “go to” florist.
Dean is so accommodating and friendly... as is the delivery team! I get flowers delivered weekly and they're always beautiful. Highly recommend!!!!

Quite simply , the best florist I have ever done business with. Their people are courteous and professional ,and the arrangements are wonderful. Your flowers can be delivered quickly if necessary ,and always effeciently.
Dean's amazing ! Professional and fast! They worked with my price range and made the trip out to Plainview Hospital. My mom loves the flowers. Thank you ACE Florist.
Both the flowers and the service were marvelous. the flowers were delivered on time when they were supposed to be and we could not have been more pleased with the courtesy of the manager
I'm new in the area and a walk-in customer.  Nice cozy store and they made an arrangement on the spot for my husband in honor of Veteran's Day!  Beautiful!
My Go to palce for any occasion  and always comes through  for quick last minute pick ups.
Exquisite roses were delivered to my job , your flowers are so beautiful! Wish i could give 10 stars !
Great price for a gorgeous arrangement; the folks behind the counter were also very knowledgeable, helpful, and friendly.
Amazing! Called for a birthday seasonal bouquet and it was fantastic! So pleased!
They do absolutely exquisite work. Highly recommended.
Best Florist on Long Island, period!
